content.detailedDescription:
Photo taken on 3-17-15 at beach area in south lake tahoe, during the afternoon.  photo taken on samsung 3g phone.  photo was taken of 
scenery surrounding the lake.  object was only noted later when reviewing  photos on the phone.  object looks to be either entering or exiting clouds as cloud cover looks to be just covering the tip.  when the photo is enlarged, the object appears to have an aura surrounding it.  object is dark in color. shape of object seems to be disk shape, but looks somewhat irregular, maybe due to reflection or clouds.
content.summary: Took photo while on ski trip at beach location south lake tahoe   did not notice object until  later when looking at photo. object in the extreme upper left of photo just entering clouds

content.detailedDescription: This was observed when i was a kid about 15years old when i was outside play with a fire outside ,it was mid summer clear night mid 1980s and i just happen to look towards the west just above the mountains i saw a shooting star this was 9:30 on i think a thursday well didn't think nothing about it till the next thursday i was doing the same i was outside playing around and saw the star again well i said i'll take a time down it was 9:30 then i was outside again sametime the something happen this happen about 4times you could set your watch at the time this star fell,well this was school summer break when that happen i kinda lost interest and stopped observing ,then later umm about 8 years later it happen again same place towards the west a shooting at about 9:30 i did follow up because of my occupation i hope this story was interesting .  thank you
content.summary: I thought it was a shoot star but when it happed on a exact time period about 5 times it changed my thoughts on it .

content.detailedDescription: At 03.04.2015y i was smoking cigarette in window, 15km from bydgoszcz when i saw small, white light flying in straight line from south to east with constant speed. at the beginning i was thinking it's just a plane. when it reach point on east it starts to hover and getting brighter, lighter from little white dot to some kind of lantern, it was bigger about 10-times, then gets darker like before and move back the same path. when this object show again i run for my brother to watch it with me. it was doing same path and hover with light again. before it flashes, they spawn blue and red light just behind this biggest white one. from this i was able to estimate the size of it... it was really big, because plane are much smaller and have their light closer to each other. next day i question friend of mine, which live near that place... when i was talking about it, he complete my sentence because he saw what we saw and more. he was talking about enormous size of that and teleporting for 100-200m after flashes, it did it 4 times, when 4th was on bigger distance, about 2-5km in opposite direction which it was travelling. he compare it to street light but it was 4 times bigger and higher that this, no sound was hearing there only barking dogs, many people saw this from street. this event take time from 20:40 cest to 21:00 cest.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was smoking cigarette in window, 15km from bydgoszcz when i saw small, white light flying in straight line from south to east with constant speed. when it hover on east start getting brighter, lighter then move back the same path.

content.detailedDescription:
1. smoking a cigarette in my garden.
2. i was looking at the sky while overthinking my day and recent events.
3. at first i thought i saw a small flock of birds. 
4. then i noticed that what i saw was moving to fast and was too big to be birds. it were four or five white glowing items, glowing from behind, as if the center of the glow wasn't completely turned my way.
5. i felt comfortable, at ease and assured during sighting and slightly excited afterwards.
6. it dissolved.
content.summary: Four or five glowing items moving fast in a flock-like formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying out and looking up at the partly cloudy day, but incredible blue sky's.  i noticed this jets white single trail and could see it against the blue sky, almost directly above me. the outline of the bottom of a jet was very noticeable, even at that distance. when the jet passed above the two clouds and from my view it passed between two clouds, i noticed an object was also trailing the jet extremely close, it was darker than the jet and smaller than the jet and it was keeping just to the jets left side. i also noticed this object was not leaving any trail behind itself it was like just there, it was just simply keeping up with the jet. i grabbed my cell phone and took a video of the jet passing by, i cannot see the object in my video, i need to have the picture enhanced and looked at closely.  i also noticed that appx. 15 to 20 min after seeing this, two jets from mac dill afb scrambled with full throttle, not normally used near residential areas heading in the same direction, only to have one or two more take off, also heading in the same direction. the first set of jest left at 12:25pm easter sunday and the second set at 12:40pm just appx. 15 min later.

thanks 
[item moved/cms/nd]


i have a video but the file seems to be too large to transfer to fb or yahoo mail..
content.summary: Military jet heading s, appx 25,000 ft leaving single white trail behind, but following the jet was a small dark object, leaving no trail & keeping apprx 200 ft behind jet. 20 min later 2 jets take off from mac dill afb, same dir & 10 more min 2 more

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a bright light in the sky late at night.  i saw what appeared to be a probe being lowered from the light and then the probe disappeared.  i thought i was recording the whole time, but i was using a new phone and missed recording the probe being sent down.  still i was able to capture a strange bright oval shaped light with a smaller light beneath it.  please view the attached video.
content.summary: I noticed a bright light in the sky late at night.  i tried to capture it on video with a new phone.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 23:00.
i was in village for holiday and i was in house, then i needed to walk with my dog outside, i opened door and i saw a red dot far from me it was flightning near ground very fast to left then it dissapear, then it apear and flight little bit more and then dissapear, at the moment my dog run out somewhere i shoutted to come back, but it didint listened, and i forget to say that the object started to fly then i saw it, i forgot that i need to film that at the moment.
about 23:20 i needed to send off my girlfriend. then i was coming back from shes house to my and then i was near door i heared strange, unknown noise, so i fast runned to home with fear.
it was time to sleep, i was sleeping with my uncle, he was sleeping to until the dog started to bark with fear my uncle woke up and saw saw a shadow then he pike up the phone lightened to shadow and he saw sokethin human size slouched thing walking on 4 legs, then monster was spooked he fast run to wall and dissapear, dog was trembling.

p.S. srry for my english, im from lithuania.
let my know if you get this and i would send pictures where it was how about it looked about if you give my your email.
content.summary: In village, night, red dot near horizon flight to left very fast then dissapear and then appear and flight and then dissapear

content.detailedDescription: It was around 3 or 4 a.M. when i left my cousins house. i live right down the road from her so i walk home very late feeling quite safe most times.  i was walking in the street when i approached my house so i cross to the sidewalk and at this point i have full view of my backyard which is always pitch black. i live on the edge of a small forest. neighbors aren't very close and i have nothing in my backyard except trees. occasionally deer will wander there but they are dark brown and can clearly see them at night and what they look like. as i was saying, when i crossed to the sidewalk i was around 30-40 feet from my front door. usually i cross the lawn, walk up the steps, go in. i reach the side walk and i see something white in the backyard. it was probably 100 ft away. i stopped on the sidewalk to look more intently.  it didn't appear to be touching the ground and it was bright enough for me to notice. we have no animals in the neighborhood that are white. ive never witnessed this before and i knew it wasn't an animal. what i saw in my backyard was round and bright and didn't appear to be touching the ground. this of course petrified me and i started walking faster to my lawn, as i moved the object seemed to move as well. i only stared at it for a total of 4-5 seconds before i wanted to get inside. it did appear to move slightly towards my direction but only when i started walking again did it move more swiftly.  i'd say it moved at 6 ft per second.  i got inside my house and quickly turned all the lights on. i have to say i wasn't brave enough to look outside again. i felt i may have been confronted by it. i also want to add i know that i do not have any evidence towards my story and that it is just my word and first hand encounter but i have not seen the white object since. p.S. i was on no substance that would hinder my perceptions and i was not tired because i had slept that day till 6pm. i feel very confident that this was some sort of "alien" because i've had multiple inexplicable things that have happened to me. none included an encounter with something like this but i've been uneasy since these things have started. hopefully i am not alone in my area and it will be looked into in some way. it's comforting to know i am not alone though.
content.summary: Walked home at nightto my house and saw it.

content.detailedDescription: All pictures other is different the neighborhood please examination 04/03/2015 time night 22:30 - 02:30
content.summary: Examination

content.summary: This ufo is shape-shifting like round, triangle or v shape and looks to be moving very slowly but not sure.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom was driving east on highway 126 leaving fillmore heading toward piru.  this is located in sunny southern california just thirty minutes north of los angeles.  we were heading home from a family get together at 3:00am.  i had never been up so late and i was still full of energy from being over stimulated.  i admit that maybe i was asleep during this event but i know without a doubt i was awake during this experience.  my step-father was asleep in the passenger side.  i sat behind my mom in the back seat looking at the night sky.  there were no clouds and the stars were crisp in their brilliance.  i watched the hillside rise and fall in elevation as we drove down the highway.  something came into view that distracted my stargazing. it was boomerang shaped where the center looked like a red box with a yellow flashing light.  it's body was a series of cross beams that held the craft together in a boomerang shape.  this craft moved parallel with the station wagon and i stared at it unblinking.  i tapped the seat in front of me.

“momma,” i said.  “there's a ufo.”

“mmmmm,” is all she said ignoring my comment.

i looked behind us seeing a few cars heading in the same direction.  i wondered if they were seeing what i was seeing.  maybe i was seeing a reflection from the headlights of the vehicles behind us so i rolled down the window.  the craft was still there flying parallel with the station wagon but now i could hear the sound it was making.  there was a low hum like a strong breeze blowing over the mouth of a bottle that whistled.  i rolled the window back up.  i tapped the seat in front of me.

“momma,” i repeated.  “there's a ufo.”

again, “mmmmm,” is all she said.

i pinched myself to make sure i wasn't dreaming.  the reality of what i was looking at started to sink in.

i tapped the seat in from of me.

“momma?” i spoke with a quivering voice.  “there's a ufo,” i struggled to speak through failing lungs.

again, “mmmmm” is all she said.

this was the last time i tried to get her attention.  she wasn't paying attention to her son whose fear was increasing.  we turned north on main street leaving highway 126 and by this time the craft had disappeared behind the hills.  i couldn't take my eyes away from watching the sky.  i had moved from sitting in my seat to being on my knees as i looked out the rear window as highway 126 fell into the distance.  what came into view didn't frighten me as much as the craft.  five silver comets followed the station wagon in beautiful synchronicity like ballet dancers moving gracefully.  their tails were like streaming ribbons of silver flecked stars.  we turned right on market street.  when we got home i ran into the house.  i was quiet when my mom helped me to bed.  the house we lived in was a small one bedroom shack.  i slept on the sofa in the small living room tucked in as i lay in the dark trying to rationalize what i just experienced.  the front door was visible from where i was positioned.  the door had a window that looked out onto a backdrop of darkness because there had been no street lights.  that's when i saw a face press up against the window.  the face was pale grey and the large black eyes peered in at me.  my mouth gaped as i screamed and i have no further memory of that night.
content.summary: Boomerang craft above rolling moutain tops along highway.

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate, daughter and i were driving west on highway 78 past nordahl drive and directly out my driver side window looking south i saw a orange globe a hundred or so feet above the ground, i said what is that and they both looked as we drove past it.  we got off at next exit while they continued to watch it and then drove down the frontage road south of freeway trying to get another look at it.  it was moving east and gaining a lot of altitude quickly.  i turned right on a road going up a hill to get a better look and we pulled over to get a video, we watched as it quickly moved away and watched it drop a red light out of the bottom which disappeared.  the object is moving quickly away and moving different directions then suddenly dropped a long distance quickly then stopped and hovered again, then started moving farther and farther away until we could not see it.  
we then started home again hoping to see it again from the top of twin oaks rd heading into san elijo hills we pulled over into park did not see it again but then a shooting star flew across to the north west but we could see that burn up and disappear.  
it was very clear sky with full moon rising from the east.
this episode made my daughter very upset and she said she felt like she was going to throw up.
at first i thought maybe a balloon or someone was playing with a drone but this does not explain it going from a few hundred yards away to out of sight over the mountains of escondido in less then 5 minutes and rising to the heights of airplanes flying through the night sky. 
if anyone knows what this was that explains it i would love to know and put my daughter at ease because she was very scared.
content.summary: Bright orange globe hovering very low then moving away and increasing altitude then dropping red light from bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was going to sleep at my house and i looked out my window when i first seen them i thought they were stars but they changed colors first white then red i thought the first day they were planes but they haven't moved they stayed in the same place since i noticed them. i obviously felt scared at the time because my life and thinking changed i though aliens existed but wwasn't sure i would ever see them during my life time i never lost sight of them there still surround my trailer but you can only see then at night
content.summary: I noticed them once in bed the two days left i went out and noticed the surrounding my trailer

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting april 4, 2015 8:15 pm and 8:30 pm torrance, ca

taking the dog for a walk and noticed a very bright deep red light approaching my position at torrance blvd and maple street in torrance, ca.  the light was moving in an east to west direction at about 100 knots.  the light was steady red.  as a private pilot it caught my attention because there were no other position or blinking strobe lights.  the traffic pattern for departing aircraft from lax briefly follows a similar path but then, the departing traffic typically makes a turn to the north and position lights are easily seen.  i estimate that i initially noticed the red light when it was over the torrance/redondo beach coastline and was at an altitude of 2,000 to 3,000 feet.  the light was following a path above torrance blvd or slightly north of torrance blvd.  when the light was about 75 degrees above my position, the red light (over several seconds) dimmed to a very faint red light.  i noticed a small plane crossing the red light’s path and an altitude about 1,000 lower.  it is just before the small plane crossed below the light that it dimmed.  i had with me a very bright 500 lumens flashlight that i pointed at the red light after it dimmed and followed it until it disappeared behind some trees.  the flashlight also has a strobe function that i also used (to see if i could get it’s attention) when following the light.  after returning to the house with the dog (about 10 minutes later) i went back outside to see if i could see any more red lights.  i was shining the light almost straight up over the house when i saw a very faint triangular shaped craft at maybe 4,000 feet and traveling in a south-east to north-west direction at 200 plus knots.  the sides of the triangle were greater than 90 degrees, maybe 100 to 110 degree spread.  there was one light at the front of the triangle and two more evenly spaced on each side.  all the lights were very dim and faded from view shortly after passing overhead.  there was another small plane passing below this craft and the size of the craft seemed to be larger (2x) than a jumbo jet.

i have many ufo sightings ever since i was a child but never encountered the triangular craft before now.
content.summary: Two objects - red light and triangular craft

content.detailedDescription:
My first sighting was on rt. 24 heading south, pulled over and watched object for 10 minutes dancing in the sky stopping and going , erratically changing direction and speed,orange glow several miles in front and then sped off at incredible speed.

second sight was a disk shaped object no more than 50 ft. in front of me standing  outside  watching it hover over a swamp about 6 ft. above the ground with colored lights all around  the middle of the disk. don't remember  leaving sight but object did not leave.

third sighting was above my head on a smoking break at work. black against the night sky it was only going 4mph and only 30 ft. above my head. it was triangular in shape, silent, and there were 3 glowing lights in the back as it passed.  one on each end in back and one in the middle but lower on the craft  than the other two giving it depth. they didn't throw off any light they jus glowed white. after it passed over me which took about 10 min. i don't remember watching it until it was out of sight.

i am a 60 year old man and have been  interested in this phenomenon since project blue book from 1964 -  1968. some people don't get the oppotunity to witness  these craft once let alone three times. it is a life changing event once you've seen these things and i would be willing to take a polygraph, undergo hypnosis, or sodium pentathol . i would swear on the bible or a loved one 's soul as to the authenticity of these events. i am a mature individual and have never had an avenue such as this one to report these experiences. at the time  there were no cell phones to take pictures or videos so i  have only my word and reputation on the line. these things are real and  i follow your show as well as  ancient aliens, i n search of aliens all on the history channel. i am happy to share all of this with you for as much as  i am respected by my family and my peers i believe they are skeptical of my  witnessing of these events. thanks for the outlet to  true believers.
content.summary: This was1 of 3 sightings i have had within a two year period. no cell phone or vidioe apparatus available at that time. two sightings within 40ft. one disk 6 ft. above ground, one triangular 30ft. above my head. 5mph and silent. 3 lights in rear .

content.detailedDescription: Spotted the ufo while at a four way stop. it darted a great distance, then hovered. my stepson, wife and i watched it for a minute or two. we went inside to get my binoculars. went back outside and it was gone. i watched the sky for another hour or so. no sign of it.
content.summary: Witnessed stationary, then darted a great distance, then hovered. went for binoculars. gone.

content.detailedDescription: We live in columbia, mo. at about 22:30hrs my son noticed what he discribed as what looked like a super nova. an object that brightened and then faded out in the nw sky. he pointed out the area to me and we watched it for about 15 to 20sec. the object then appeared again, closer to us but still in the nw sky. it looked like a star. when it faded the second time my son said that he thought it moved off in a ne direction after it faded. we were both excited and would of liked to film something but the whole event took less than a minute.
content.summary: Son noticed what he discribed as what looked like a super nova between two stars that brightened then faded. we saw it brighten then fade.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my front porch smoking and looking at the stars. i noticed an unusually large low bright object and began focusing on it. when i looked away, my vision was a bit blurred because it was so bright. at first i thought it was a chopper, then saw no red lights flashing and it wasn't moving or making any noise for how close it was. as i watched it hover over some trees about 1/2 mile away, it started to descend into the tree line. at this point i had been watching it for about 12-14 minutes. when i lost site i went further out into the street to see if it was visible and i could not see the object. at first i was curious, then i got a bit scared because i realized this is abnormal and not a helicopter. i lost site of it when my neighbor pulled up and said hi. i'm assuming it fell below the tree line because after our 20 second conversation the object was out of site. it's not possible if it gained altitude and wouldn't be visible, seeing as it's a perfectly clear night. i'm confused. 

i've provided a video. in the beginning i'm trying to focus and adjust. towards the end you can see the light twinkling.
content.summary: Too big and close for a star. very bright. silent. twinkling and flashing white-bright

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i walked to the beach around 4 am one night in summer 2012 one of the weirdest years but we saw this light by the water floating i thought it was a boat but then it rose up and was way brighter than a boat light then it seemed to grow it became big like the moon so then i assumed it was the moon but then it flew off super fast it disappeared sort of how the rockets disappear when they go into space i could see the orb get smaller and smaller until it vanished from my line of vision then after i look down again and there are groups of teenager looking people one of them was holding a light and staring at me another was making weird bird like noises with their mouth and when they walked their legs seemed to be not there like the top half of them were human like but their legs every time they took a step forward their legs would drop down and they would slide forward they didn't need to pick up and plant their legs to move they just lifted then dropped and they slid forward their legs were ghost like but i rubbed my eyes to see if i was seeing things but i wasnt they group of teen like people were there i spoke to my friend who was next to me asking if he saw what i did he agreed then we looked back and the group was gone now that i think back i wish i would have walked up to them and asked who they were and what they wanted but i was in shock i couldn't believe what i was seeing.
content.summary: There was a orangeish yellow globe in the sky and it rose up then burst away in tue speed of light

content.detailedDescription: Saw 4 red orange glowing circular objects traveling in a line at an altitude a little lower than commercial flight. the objects then got lower in the sky and were no longer flying in a line. as they lowered to the ground, they slowly winked out so they were no longer visible. this happened to all 4 objects. very weird!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 red orange glowing circular objects flying first in a line, then descending to wink out

content.detailedDescription: Walking up pennsylvania avenue in oakmont p.A it appeared as a star then began moving after i kept looking at it.I felt like it didn't want to be observed. it made no sound.The bright white faded tpo a dull blue then blinked out.
content.summary: Hovered siliently then faded to blue

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house (on a hill) when i saw an orange light moving from the south west to the south east, so i stopped and looked.  i then saw more of them flying in a linear formation.  after a while, about 50 of them had went by, at varying, yet similar altitudes, some of them making a descent.  i'm new to this and don't know if it's relevant, but they were flying over a power-line.
content.summary: 30 or more orange lights in straight path moving in the sky at varying altitudes

content.detailedDescription: Noticed three orange lights in the sky perhaps over moscow idaho.  they were far apart in the sky but seemed to be tracking together.  got some crude photos. size of closest got to be about 1/5th of a little finger width at arms length.
content.summary: Three orange lights in the sky at distance slowly tracking together.

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling north from coupland on texas 95 when i spotted an unusual object due north, apparently hovering over taylor, about 7 miles to the north of my position. the rectangular shape was somewhat indistinct at first. at first i thought that it could be a blimp but very quickly realized that it was not. as i got closer it appeared to move slowly westward. at times it appeared to be two long shapes parallel to each other, again somewhat indistinct or blurry. i soon noticed that it was accompanied by a small, white, indistinct, round or oval object (definitely not an airplane)and a black helicopter. by the time i was about two miles south of taylor, the rectangle was clear and distinct, floating on one of its long edges and changing attitude slowly. by the time i reached taylor at texas 79 it appeared to be only two-to-three miles to the west, and i was excited that i would have a very close-up view within a couple of minutes. i reached for my phone to call a friend before turning onto 79 and when i looked up a few seconds later it was gone. judging by the size of the helicopter, the rectangle must have been at least 300 ft long. it had a white or gray stripe lengthwise across its center. no lights were observed on the object.
content.summary: Large rectangle accompanied by black helicopter and smaller white object sighted from texas 95 northbound. it appeared to be over taylor moving westward toward hutto.D

content.detailedDescription: I was going to menemen/izmir/turkey from manisa/turkey . i was look the sky and see that light and take a photo quickly. i think , two object in the light beam and they are moved.
content.summary: Mysterious red light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i open my door a little after eight in the morning and saw a strange spherical shaped object in the north sky with a long vaporous tail flowing away from it. at first i thought it was just a strange cloud formation until i saw how it moved. it was moving slowly towards the east but the wind was blowing the vapor tail to the south from a strong north wind. it changed shape a couple of times, to a wedge like shape when it seemed to speed up some, and oval shaped once, but always return to the spherical shape.It seem to keep the same regular pace only slightly hesitating or speeding up every so often.
 the tail flowed all the way to the southern horizon. the object resembled a comet inside the atmosphere though i know that's not what it was of course.
 it was generally white in color but seem to take on a type of a yellowish, greenish, tint when the light shined on it just right.
 i had time to film four separate videos of the object. i kept running out of room on my media card and having to erase other material to record more. it was there for over an hour and a half before i lost sight of it to the east.
 i started not to report this but after some friends of mine recently saw the video they told me i should tell you guys about it. i don't know if it's an object or weather phenomenon or what but i have seen another wider one take the same path just recently that i filmed also.
 that guy waring from daily ufo sightnings online saw it on youtube & said it resembled a photograph of a cloaking u.F.O from 1952 at a military base here in oklahoma he said. he did a  little article on my sighting a couple of months ago. and use the video without my permission. haha like that never happens.
content.summary: When i open my door that morning there was a spherical object leaving a vapor trail to the north

content.detailedDescription: I wrote at 5;15 am to shoot the blood moon set up camera on tripod shot a little video got cold so i got in my hero and waited for the eclipse.I saw what i thought would be a police helicopter about 2 miles to the south shining a strong light straight down.But could not hear anything so i knew it was not the police blood pressure went up i fumbled for my video camera and watched while it came straight at me.For the life of me i could not turn my video on and got real anxious and scared.I was one button away from shooting the best video of a ufo ever.They stopped me i couldn't do it this ship went 200 feet right over me and i could not move.Dam it looked like a747 without a sound louder than a glider i knew what i was witnessing i have seen them before but not this close.This craft was not of this world and i had to watch it turn over me from its north heading witch would take out to the local airport to the north east blinking and silently stalking away.This craft was made to look like our passenger jets but i knew as soon as i saw the wrong tips one blinking green and one red at 2friking hundred feet what it really was.When i got home i looked for it on utube found it did the same thing to a gentleman in colorado but he was able to film it until it got close and they stopped him same craft red and green wing tips with bright white in the center.I'm so pissedoff no pictures, no video.Now i'm just friken tired!!!!'i'm not sure if i want to talk or not i reported 2 years ago and it just feels useless what are we gunna do when they can fly right over my head completely silent? like i said i'm getting really tired maybe want us to just throw in the towel i've been looking for that sighting since i was 14 and i'm 59 now and i'm still as scared as the 14 year old who saw things that were not meant to be seen.......
content.summary: I am tired and this scared the hell out of me, this is my second sighting but never have i been so close and scared.I was shooting the blood moon, had video and photo could not move to capture it.I'm tired

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north bound on the 405 freeway in long beach, ca. just after 11:00 a.M. on 4/4/15 and sighted what i thought was a strange sight. there was a streight "darker that the sky" almost clear streak going from ne to sw as far as i could see. right next to it was something "maybe a plane as i could not see it" leaving a chem trail right next to the dark streak.It looked as though the streak was being used as a guide. the trail was blooming out where it had beed left minutes before to look like it was filling the gap of the streak. at one point the craft crossed over the streak to the other side but the trail still seemed to be filling the streak. shortly after sighting the cross over i lost sight of the streak as i had traveled beyoud where i could look at that part of the sky.
it seemed as though there were more chem trails in the sky yesterday that normal.
content.summary: Vapor trail being made beside darker line in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Walking my pup ruby...The sun appeared weird with a great halo surrounding it and what appeared to be an electrically charged arm of the sun reaching out like a beam to a spot to the right and that opened up to a rainbow...I found this interesting...I took out my bb and took 4 pics...The 1st 3 were taken quick...Not looking at sun directly...Too bright...The 4th pic was last taken when i rounded a corner a few minutes after...

i never seen the greenish orb in air...Just took pic of it...So it was a shock to see it when i looked at the images...The trenton air force base is 2.8 km west of the pics taken...I am retired military...Could be something could be nothing! 

cheers
content.summary: Walking ruby, sun was looking electrically charged, arms shooting out to a spot in sky that opened up a rainbow..I took 4 pics

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Me my son and his friend was outside throwing the football around a bright red light was far away maybe miles away and then instantly went through my tree illuminating the branches red without disturbing a single leaf.. we were hurling over each other and trying to get into the house first. only when we mustered up the courage to go back outside we seen it just backing back through the tree and again illuminating the branches bright red while not disturbing a single branch. when i realize my neighbor across the street from me had seen the same thing we were talking about it with so much feared amusement not sure what to make of it. knowing my son and his friend also seen the same thing it made me feel more credible to know that an adult had witnessed the same thing.  then in the middle of our conversation by neighbor pauses and points behind me over the top of my roof were we both see this red boomerang like object just appeared over the left side of my house and then slowly proceeded north to south (left to right). just as it passed over my house completely it then ascended very very quickly going up like at an angle going south southwest then just disappeared. my wife doesn't even go outside and look at the stars anymore because when she was a witness to it she couldn't believe it. it was too much for her. it is taking a lot of time out of my time spending with my family. my wife does not allow me to talk about it around her. she says it scares her so much not knowing what it is she would rather not see it at all she does not even enjoy going outside and looking up at the stars anymore. my kids see it often outside with me at night time as well. nighttime is when it's most active. i'm not talking about 1 or 2 lights i'm talking about a whole string of different groups of lights that make up many different shaped objects. they drop down almost right on top of me over my head and then they quickly ascend up so high where they look so small again and do it almost instantly. i am willing to prove this to anyone i have already showed my pastor of my church he lend me his video camera and he still doesn't know what to think of it and i actually caught a full saucer on film this time when i was recording. i only did this for my pastor to prove it to him that i wasn't crazy. this has been such a natural occurrence around me that my family and friends now all think that either they believe me cuz i they have seen it when they would listen to me so i could show them or they haven't seen it so i think i'm crazy i'm willing to prove this to anyone. it's almost like an unspoken understanding that when i look at these things they come down literally right in front of me and then when everyone hears that. they think i'm nuts but you have to see it to believe it i'm not playing this is 100% genuine i can guarantee this and my wife and kids see it as well. recently i've been getting these  single little lights coming down that reflect like an -a- and were so bright and brilliant with beautiful colors it almost looks like a fairy even though it sounds silly that's exactly what it looks like some of the time now. please you guys have to believe me i am very willing to prove this to anyone. you can stay in my house and i'll leave or if you want me to be here i can prove it to you and show you in person. i don't want to think that i'm crazy but this phenomenon has been going on for 6 months and i know for a fact its not me or i'm going crazy at all. sorry for sending this in so late a lady from mufon told me to do this a while back i just now got access to a computer. thank you for taking this and thank you for assuring me that i'm not going crazy is a hundred percent real.I hope you you guys seriously consider meeting up with me or at least coming by so you can see it for yourself. thank you
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown

content.summary: Red orb miles up insantley few through tree in front of me and many others followed by red boomerang type over my house then instantly up s,se then dissaprd
